sn6.6:2.5: I agree with MS here as opposed to BB, it feels more like a question here, cp. say AN 6.62
sn6.6:5.1: The _haṁsa_ is a swan or goose. Though rarely seen in most of India today, the swan is a fitting image in such elevated contexts.
sn6.6:6.1: Taking jalate here as optative, in the previous as middle active (if it isn’t in fact jalati)
